title: Study Hub
description: StudyHub is a web application that I created as group project to help students that are pursuing BTech in CSE or IT field can access their study materials from anywhere.

title: My Weather App
description: My Weather App use to find current weather of a city. It also show the other aspects of that city like sunrise time, sunset time, etc.

title: Recipes DB
description: Recipes DB is a web application where you can search for recipes. There is variety of recipes available on this website.

title: EvoGym
description: Unrivaled Gym. Unparalleled Training Fitness Classes. World Class Studios to get the Body Shapes That you Dream of.. Get Your Dream Body Now.
